item.description:
Lisa's Very Groovy Hands-On Chakra Class

Perfect for Reiki and Psychic development!

What are your chakras anyway, and how do they actually work? They are a lot more then little spinning wheels of energy. They are a complex and magnificent way to understand your whole being, a fabulous and infinitely informative lens to understand yourself through.

Most importantly, understanding the chakras gives you an invaluable way to continue your personal and spiritual development that will take you to a whole new level.

In this seven class workshop, we will explore -

* The basics of what each chakra is and how they present as balanced, excessive or deficient.
* Learn how to read other peoples chakra's just by looking at them!
* Get hands on training with tablework. We will practice feeling what they are like when they are blocked, open or balanced.
* Learn to use a pendulum as an accurate and objective way to read the chakras- no more guessing!
* Advanced healing techniques to balance and heal each chakra
* Develop and heal your own chakra system for life changing personal growth


This class is a must for all Reiki and psychic development students!

Class meets every other Monday for seven classes, starting Monday, Sept 20th. 7-9pm at Solstice.

$40 a class. Please bring a pendulum. Register with Lisa to get into this class! It's going to fill up!

group.name: The Metrowest Reiki and Energy Healers Share

item.name: Lisa's Very Groovy Hands-On Chakra Class
